long_description: The Smith Showdown polarized sunglasses feature featherlight stainless-steel frames in a classic aviator profile for the ultimate in style and durability. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Scratch- and impact-resistant Carbonic(TM) lenses use Tapered Lens Technology from Smith(TM) to provide distortion-free vision. Tapered Lens Technology contours the thickness of the lens so that light travels through without distortion-what's to be seen is what you get. Matte gunmetal frames feature polarized gray green lenses to eliminate glare and produce the truest transmission of natural colors. Matte brown frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and provide an optically comfortable lens. Frames are constructed from sleek, sturdy stainless steel. Megol(TM) temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather; adjustable silicone nose pads. Smith Showdown polarized sunglasses have a medium fit with medium coverage.
